addMarginLong(address,uint256).notice: Add margin to a long position.

addMarginShort(address,uint256).notice: Add margin to a short position.

closeLongLoss().notice: Close the long position at a loss.

closeLongProfit().notice: Close the long position at a profit.

closeShort().notice: Close the short position of the caller.

closeShortLoss().notice: Close the short position at a loss.

closeShortProfit().notice: Close the short position at a profit.

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize the contract with oracle and settlement token addresses.  _priceOracle Address of the price oracle.  _settlementToken Address of the settlement token.

currentPrice().notice: Returns the current price from the oracle.

fundingRateLong(address).notice: Update the funding rate for a long position.

fundingRateShort(address).notice: Update the funding rate for a short position.

liquidateLong(address).notice: Liquidate the long position of a user.

liquidateShort(address).notice: Liquidate the short position of a user.

openLong(uint256,uint256).notice: Open a long position with specified margin and leverage.

openShort(uint256,uint256).notice: Open a short position with specified margin and leverage.
